short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable Quickview for Alibaba to search any products in Alibaba for fast interaction

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your Alibaba sourcing with 1 click! Install the Alibaba Chrome extension for quick access to diverse products on Alibaba. Easily explore data on ratings, buyers, visibility, and reviews for efficient product research. 🛍️

Key features of Quickview for Alibaba chrome extension

Explore millions of Alibaba products in seconds right from within your browser. 🌐
Dig into ratings, trends in buyer behavior, visibility, and review scores to make smarter sourcing decisions. 📊
Eliminate the need to look through countless search pages and research product models. 💡
Maximize your profits through informed sourcing decisions. 💰
With just a click of the button, you can have access to powerful research tools anytime anywhere. 🖱️

How to use: 

1.	Visit the Chrome Web Store. 🌐
2.	Search for "Quickview for Alibaba Chrome extension" in the search bar. 🔍
3.	Click on the extension in the search results and then click "Add to Chrome" to install it. 🛒
4.	After installation, the extension's icon should appear in your Chrome toolbar, typically near the address bar. 📌
5.	Click on the icon to activate the extension. 🚀
6.	Open the extension and connect your Alibaba.com account for full access. 🔗
7.	Select the preferred currency, language, and notification settings. Hover over any product image and see how magic happens! ✨
8.	The extension instantly displays key research data: Ratings, verified buyers’ feedback, product rank, and even reviews. 📊
9.	Compare like products side by side for a full analysis. Display data in spreadsheets for easy offline analysis. 📈
10.	Find out different alternatives and unique product options your competitors overlook. 👀
